doc:
Antonin Artaud https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antonin_Artaud 0 Antoine Marie Joseph Artaud, better known as Antonin Artaud (French: [aʁto]; 4 September 1896 – 4 March 1948), was a French dramatist, poet, essayist, actor, and theatre director, widely recognized as one of the major figures of twentieth-century theatre and the European avant-garde. Antoine_Marie_Joseph_Artaud , better_known as Antonin_Artaud ( French : [_aʁto_] ; 4_September_1896 – 4_March_1948 ) , was a_French_dramatist , poet , essayist , actor , and theatre_director , widely_recognized as one of the_major_figures of twentieth-century_theatre and the_European_avant-garde .
